    • Constructor Detail

      • TradeReceivedController

        public TradeReceivedController(TradeReceivedActivity activity)

    • Method Detail

      • acceptTradeButtonOnClick

        public void acceptTradeButtonOnClick()
        onClick method for when the "Accept" button is clicked on a trade. This causes the proposed trade to be accepted. The trade's status is changed from "Pending" to "Accepted", and both parties in the trade are emailed about the trade being accepted.

      • updateTextViews

        public void updateTextViews()
        Method for updating the text in the TradeReceivedActivity that displays the username (email addresses) of the friend you are trading with and the status of the trade.

      • declineTradeButtonOnClick

        public void declineTradeButtonOnClick()
        onClick method for when the "Decline" button is clicked on a trade. This causes the proposed trade to be declined. The trade's status is changed from "Pending" to "Declined", but the user is directed to the CounterTradeActivity to propose a counter trade if they so choose.
